name: ACADEMY POWER
description: During each Ranger turn this battle, instead of playing a card, any Ranger may discard a card from their hand. If they do, they may perform an attack with 2 dice.

name: ANIMARIUM ARMOR
description: Use when you reveal a card for defense. Add 1 [SHIELD] to that card.

name: BLACK BOX
description: Use when you play an attack card. Double the amount of [HIT] dealt by that attack.

name: CROWN OF THE COINLESS
description: When any Ranger spends at least 1 [ENERGY] to play a card, place 1 hit token on this card (max 3). Use before you roll dice for an attack. When you do, remove all hit...

name: DEFENDER VEST
description: Use after you resolve a card. The next time any Ranger suffers damage in this battle, reduce that damage by the amount of [ENERGY] spent to play that card.

name: DEFENDER WHEEL
description: Use at any time. Reach 1 exhausted Zord card of your choice.

name: DINO CHARGE BATTLIZER
description: Use when you perform an attack. Another Ranger may reveal an attack card with an energy cost of 1 or zero from their hand. If they do, your attack gains the effect text of that card.

name: DINO KNIGHT MODE
description: Use when you reveal a card for defense. Gain 1 [ENERGY] for each [SHIELD] and [CHROMAFURY] icon on that card.

name: DRAGON SHIELD
description:
Use to resolve one of the following effects:
After you resolve an attack, perform an additional attack with 3 dice.
When you suffer damage. Reduce that damage by 2. Then deal 2 [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice

name: HYPERFORCE BATTLIZER
description: Use at the start of a battle. The Rangers may ignore the FAST keyword to take the first turn in battle.

name: LIGHTS OF ORION
description: Until the end of this battle, each time a Ranger plays a card, they may draw 1 card to reduce it's energy cost by 1.

name: METALLIC ARMOR
description: During this battle, the first time each Ranger reveals a card for defense, they may treat it as having a shield value of 4.

name: POWER OF THE SOLARIX
description: Until the end of this battle, each time a Ranger uses a once-per-battle ability, they may then return 1 card from their discard pile to their hand.

name: QUANTUM MEGABATTLE ARMOR
description: Use after you roll dice for an attack. You may convert 1 [MISS] result to a [HIT] result or 1 [HIT] result to a [HIT][HIT] result.

name: RED BATTLIZER ARMOR
description: Use before you roll dice for an attack. Add 1 die to that attack.

name: RED FURY MODE
description: Use before you roll dice for an attack. Add 2 dice to that attack. After that attack resolves, another Ranger must suffer damage equal to the number of [MISS] results rolled.

name: S.W.A.T. ARMOR
description: During this battle, the first time each Ranger spends [ENERGY] to play a card or use a character ability, they may first deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of their choice.

name: STEALTH SUIT
description: Use at any time. Move your figure from any location to this card or from this card to an other location of your choice.

name: SUPER DINO MODE
description: During this battle, the first time each Ranger performs an attack, add 1 die to that attack.

name: SWORD OF DARKNESS
description: Use during any Ranger turn in battle. Instead of playing a card, spend 3 [ENERGY] to deal 6 [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice.

name: SWORD OF LIGHT
description: Until the end of this battle, each other Ranger is considered to have your character ability in addition to their own.

name: THE POWER OF SIX
description:
Use to resolve one of the following effects:
When any Ranger gains [ENERGY], they gain 6 [ENERGY] instead.
When any Ranger rolls dice for an attack, they roll roll 6 dice instead.
When any Ranger suffers damage, reduce that damage by 6

name: THUNDER SLINGER
description: Use when any Ranger plays an attack card. Add 1 die to that attack for each [ENERGY] spent to play that card.

name: TIME JET
description: Each time you play a card, place it on this card after it resolves instead of discarding it. Use at the end of a battle. When you do, shuffle those cards back into your deck.

name: TRIASSIC BATTLIZER
description: Use when you perform an attack to ignore the GUARD keyword when choosing a target for that attack.

name: ZEO JET CYCLES
description: Use before the start of a battle. Move up to 2 Ranger figures from the center to the location of this battle.
